channel.title: SQLServer on Pains.net
channel.description: Recent content in SQLServer on Pains.net

item.title: Detecting changes on SQL Server Temporal Changes
item.description: SQL Server temporal tables are a great way to build data audit and to see the state of data at a point in time. However, if you want to calculate what changed over a period of time, it gets a little trickier. Keep reading to see how.

item.title: Enforce read only access in SQL Server queries
item.description: If you run dynamic or configurable SQL queries and you need to ensure that writes are denied, this post is for you.
